hints.content:
$\blue7\pink0$ has $\blue7$ tens and $\pink0$ ones.

$\blue7\pink7$ has $\blue7$ tens and $\pink7$ ones.  

$\blue8\pink7$ has $\blue8$ tens and $\pink7$ ones.

$\blue8\pink8$ has $\blue8$ tens and $\pink8$ ones.

The least number is $70$ because it has $7$ tens and $0$ ones.

The greatest number is $88$ because it has $8$ tens and $8$ ones.
Here are the numbers in order from least to greatest: $70$, $77$, $87$, $88$.
